trans-unit.source:
\n

Represents a block that contains a sequence of expressions where variables can be defined.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxxxx x xxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxx x xxxxxxxx xx xxxxxxxxxxx xxxxx xxxxxxxxx xxx xx xxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The read-only collection containing all the expressions in this block.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx$xxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxx xxx xxxxxxxxxxx xx xxxx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets the last expression in this block.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xxx xxxx xxxxxxxxxx xx xxxx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets the variables defined in this block.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xx xxxx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The read-only collection containing all the variables defined in this block.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx$xxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xx xxxx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The visitor to visit this node with.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxx xx xxxxx xxxx xxxx xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Creates a new expression that is like this one, but using the supplied children.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxx x xxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxx xx xxxx xxxx xxx$ xxx xxxxx xxx xxxxxxxx xxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
If all of the children are the same, it will return this expression.

\n
trans-unit.target: Xx xxx xx xxx xxxxxxxx xxx xxx xxxx$ xx xxxx xxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

This expression if no children changed, or an expression with the updated children.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xxxxxxxxxx xx xx xxxxxxxx xxxxxxx$ xx xx xxxxxxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxx.$$x$$x
